resources.string:
Anurag is a Kind medical student who enjoys photography

 		~ A Biography ~ 

Anurag Dubey is a 19-year-old medical student who enjoys photography, painting and ferret racing. He is Kind and Humble, but can also be very Selfish and a bit Stupid.


He is an Indian Hindu who defines himself as straight. He is currently at college. studying medicine.


Physically, Anurag is in pretty good shape. He is average-height with walnut skin, black hair and black eyes.


He grew up in a middle class neighbourhood. After his father died when he was young, he was raised by his mother


He is currently in a relationship with Alisha Connie Morales. Alisha is 20 years older than him and works as a screenplay writer.


Anurag's best friend is a medical student called Vincent Quinn. They have a very firey friendship. He also hangs around with Ida Rivera and Ira Patterson. They enjoy watching YouTube videos together.


For privacy reasons, your creation will be removed from the web at 12:13pm BST and later deleted from our server, unless you choose to publish it.
